subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Robbie Findley’s first-half goal put a comeback out of reach for the Timbers and Real Salt Lake advanced to the M.L.S. Cup with a 1-0 victory over Portland.
snippet: Robbie Findley’s first-half goal put a comeback out of reach for the Timbers and Real Salt Lake advanced to the M.L.S. Cup with a 1-0 victory over Portland.
